subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hello.
 I placed an order on your website on December 3rd (Order #SSN4350).
 Today is December 12th, and I still haven't received a tracking
number—apparently the order hasn't shipped.
 I've already contacted your support team, but haven't received a response.
 What's the problem, and how long will I have to wait for my order?

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9061 中
